posts.post_content:
Art, flavor text and ability come together really well. Underpowered even back in the day though.

Posted By: TPmanW (11/5/2011 6:01:35 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
PERFECT PLAY:  
  
Turn 1: Swamp, [Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual), Grollub  
Turn 2: Mountain, [Bazaar Trader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bazaar Trader)  
Turn 3: Mountain, suspend [Shivan Meteor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shivan Meteor)  
Turn 4: Mountain, [Ragged Veins](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ragged Veins) on Grollub, give Grollub to opponent via Bazaar Trader, hit opponent with some cheap burn spells.  
Turn 5: Shivan Meteor on opponent's Grollub - gain 13 life; 13 life loss to opponent, Mountain, Finish with some more cheap burn spells.  
  
GROLLUB VICTORY.  
  
:P

GROLLUB VICTORY.
